DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate efficacy safety BI 10773 type 2 diabetic patient renal impairment order provide data approval BI 10773 antidiabetic agent regulatory authority .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Empagliflozin ( BI 10773 ) Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Renal Impairment
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Diagnosis type 2 diabetes mellitus prior inform consent estimate glomerular filtration rate < 90 ml/min . 2 . Male female patient diet exercise regimen pretreated antidiabetic therapy maximum tolerate dose unchanged 12 week prior randomisation . 3 . HbA1c great equal 7.0 % less equal 10.0 % . 4 . Aged 18 year . 5 . Body Mass Index less equal 45 kg/m2 Exclusion criterion : 1 . Uncontrolled hyperglycaemia define > 13.3 mmol/L overnight fast placebo runin . 2 . Impaired renal function , define estimate glomerular filtration rate < 15 ml/min . 3 . Renal impairment require form chronic dialysis . 4 . Requiring acute dialysis within three month prior inform consent . 5 . Renal transplant recipient . 6 . Myocardial infarction , stroke Transient Ischemic Attack within three month prior inform consent . 7 . Indication liver disease . 8 . Bariatric surgery within past two year . 9 . Medical history cancer . 10 . Blood dyscrasia disorder cause hemolysis unstable red blood cell . 11 . Contraindications preexist background antidiabetic therapy . 12 . Treatment antiobesity drug . 13 . Current treatment systemic steroid change dosage thyroid hormone within six week prior inform consent uncontrolled endocrine disorder except Type 2 Diabetes . 14 . Premenopausal woman nurse pregnant childbearing potential practising acceptable method birth control .
